=head1 NAME

KinoSearch::Store::LockErr - Lock exception.

=head1 SYNOPSIS

    while (1) {
        my $bg_merger = eval {
            KinoSearch::Index::BackgroundMerger->new( index => $index );
        };
        if ( blessed($@) and $@->isa("KinoSearch::Store::LockErr") ) {
            warn "Retrying...\n";
        }
        elsif (!$bg_merger) {
            # Re-throw.
            die "Failed to open BackgroundMerger: $@";
        }
        ...
    }



=head1 DESCRIPTION

LockErr is a subclass of Err which indicates that a file locking problem
occurred.







=head1 INHERITANCE

KinoSearch::Store::LockErr isa L<KinoSearch::Obj::Err> isa L<KinoSearch::Obj>.
